title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - February 23rd, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - February 23rd, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Including highlights from the NBA All-Star Technology Summit, featuring interviews with:-Washington Wizards owner Ted Leonsis

-Philadelphia 76ers owner David Blitzer

-Sacramento Kings owner Vivek Ranadive

-NBA Chief Innovation Officer Amy Brooks

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
